resources.string: select sum(studentLot) as studentLots, sum(facultyLot) as facultyLots from parkinglot, lotproximity, buildings where parkinglot.lotid = lotproximity.parkinglot_lotid and lotproximity.buildings_buildingcode = buildings.buildingcode and buildings.name = ?

select parkinglot_lotid as lotid from parkinglot, lotproximity, buildings where parkinglot.lotid = lotproximity.parkinglot_lotid and lotproximity.buildings_buildingcode = buildings.buildingcode and buildings.name = ? and parkinglot.studentLot = ? and parkingLot.facultyLot = ?
select * from parkingspace where parkinglot_lotid = ? and available = ? limit 0,5
